name: Holy Name School
description: Holy Name Catholic School is accredited by the Western Catholic Educational Association (WCEA) a part of the Western Association of Schools and Colleges (WASC). It offers schools for most age groups and extended care programs as well.
fullDescription: Holy Name Catholic School is accredited by the Western Catholic Educational Association (WCEA) a part of the Western Association of Schools and Colleges (WASC). It offers schools for most age groups and extended care programs as well.
